explanation: The condition used abs(a-b) in [1,3], which only checks whether the difference is exactly 1 or exactly 3. The likely intent was to allow any difference of 1 through 3 inclusive, but the list [1,3] does not represent that range. I fixed the single line by replacing [1,3] with [1,2,3] so the code correctly checks for differences 1, 2, or 3.
